description.displayText:
I have employed several home managers throughout my family life. Patti, by far has exceeded every expectation. She always goes above and beyond the standard you would expect. 
I experienced a devastating loss last year and have had to face many challenges. Patti immediately stepped up to support me during this difficult time. She is more than a housekeeper,she a person who truly cares about the families she works for. 
Patti always see the details of my home that need attention. I never feel that I need to go behind her work.
Patti's integrity is above reproach,I trust her  with my home and my family. I highly recommend her and I know she would be an asset to any family.
description.originalText:

description.displayText:
Patty is fantastic! She started working for us 2 years ago and has worked with us on a regular schedule since then. She is responsible, thorough and an all around amazing person.  She cleans for us, as well as takes care of my three young children. She is a very hard worker.  Her standards for cleanliness exceed my own, and she goes above and beyond to make sure our house is clean to her standards - even when I would say "oh, it is good enough".  
She has an amazing relationship with my children and is like part of the family.  She is someone who truly loves children.  She is extremely reliable, and on the rare occasion in the last two years when she had to cancel a scheduled shift, she always works with us to find a time to make it up.  She is reducing her hours with us only because my children will all be in school in the fall -  I would recommend her without hesitation!
